name: Asian Conference on Civil, Material and Environmental Sciences
content: Dear Sir/Madam Greeting from Asian Conference on Civil, Material and Environmental Sciences (2017 ACCMES) Please add the following information on your webpage for advertisement of conference. Name of conference: Asian Conference on Civil, Material and Environmental Sciences (2017 ACCMES) Date(s) of conference: July 25-27, 2017 Full location details: Okinawa, Japan Key dates (registration, abstract submission etc): Abstract/Paper Submission Deadline April 20, 2017 Notification of Acceptance May 5, 2017 Final Abstract/ Full Paper Submission Deadline May 25, 2017 Registration Deadline May 25, 2017 Conference Date July 25-27, 2017 Website link: accmes.org Contact details: acme@accmes.org Organized by Higher Education Forum 12-1F.,No.129,Sec.1,Fuxing S.Rd.,Taipei,Taiwan http://www.prohef.org/ Tel:+886227401498 Fax:+886227522642
